data.title: Add scroll bar feature into ScrollView

milestone.title: v3.8
milestone.description:
This version is planned to only "fix existing bugs" and "unfinished tasks".
We need to improve the quality after a 3D rush in v3.6 and v3.7.

data.body:
Add scroll bar feature into ScrollView.
- It can be enabled / disabled.
- It auto-hides itself when move is ended. Auto-hide can be also enabled / disabled.
- The width is adjustable.
- The color is adjustable.
- Position can be changed.

data.title: [ci skip] Solve the error in simulator.
EXC_BAD_ACCESS on Transition on OSX 10.11 beta 2
data.body: The problem is in the file **CCTransition.m** When method `-(void)draw:(CCRenderer *)renderer transform:(const GLKMatrix4 *)transform` tries to run, the objc_msgSend call causes EXC_BAD_ACCESS. I fixed it changing this typedef id (*Func)(id, SEL); ((Func)objc_msgSend)(self, _drawSelector); to this void (_Func)(id, SEL) = (void (_)(id, SEL)) objc_msgSend; Func(self, _drawSelector); I checked in Github and the problem is still there in the last version. I am using cocos2d V3 3.3. Hope this helps to improved this great product!

data.title: cc.RenderTexture.setBlendFunc(cc.ONE_MINUS_SRC_ALPHA, cc.ZERO)  NATIVE and WEB run results are different
Fixbug: CCTargetedAction executes callback twice.
data.body:
The reason is TargetedAction don't override the parent(ActionInterval)'s function isDone().
The TargetedAction's isDone logic is different of ActionInterval.

https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/8262

data.title: LabelTTF:the letters slightly cut
data.body:
i'm using the cocos2dx v3.1.1.
i found the labelttf may slightly cut with some letters, especially "069".
as you may see, the upper one is from v3.6 and the performance is right.
the one below is from my project.
for some reason, i can't update the project to v3.6 immediately, i can only slowly compare the code and update my project.
So, which part of the code in the engine should i compare to solve the problem?
thanks a lot.
![labelfft](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4132186/8494270/d909d4aa-2195-11e5-991d-6eb2cad67d85.png)

Make transition from separated images to sprite frames in packed texture more smooth
为RichText加入自动设置ContentSize的height功能
data.body:
*如果 用户设置 txt:setContentSize(460, 0)，height设置为0，视为自动适应大小的RichText
 *亦可单独弄一个方法用于设置是”否自动设置RichText的高度“，但是，我觉得ContentSize的hight设置为0，就自动设置高度是蛮合理的。与Label的setDimensions用法相似
 *自动设置高度这个功能在开发过程中经常需要用到。例如：开发聊天系统的时候，自动设置高度可以很方便的用于各条消息之间的位置设置
